item.title: Report E-2024110485
item.description:
Report E-2024110485

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-27T12:24:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-30
  • City: RICHLAND
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0208 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal LJS. It was reported that approximately 0.5-gallons of Mineral Spirits released from a metal pail due to improper loading. The release impacted inside of trailer #3192680. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site.
